name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Polygon
description: This is a repository of polygon APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Polygon
apis.description: Polygon.io offers streaming realtime data for stocks/equities, ETFs, Indecies and Forex/Currencies including crypto currencies. Our Real-Time Stock Data APIs help you build the future on fintech.
